notes: This is one of the bosses in the [[Forgotten Knowledge Quest]]. It looks like a [[Crystal Warlord Outfits|Crystal Warlord]] mounted on a [[Flamesteed]]. It is one form of the [[Thorn Knight]].
sounds: I'm the hunter and you are my prey!
name: Mounted Thorn Knight
behaviour: They can destroy a [[Possessed Tree]] (2500 hp) with one hit.
location: A dungeon {{Mapper Coords|127.111|128.113|14|2|text=here}}, accessible through the [[Desecrated Glade]].
strategy: Do not use [[Death Damage]] against it otherwise it will heal 10 times the damage it was supposed to receive.
